contentBody.headMarkup:
<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }" />

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />



<!-- branding stylesheets -->
    
<!-- General -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="<SITE>/favicon.ico?v=2" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{basePath}/assets/css/theme.css?{versionKey}" />
<style>
    /* CXO PAGE */
    .cxo-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 20px; /* Space between columns */
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px; /* Max width for the container */
            margin: 0 auto; /* Center the container */
        }
        .cxo-item {
            text-align: left;
        }
        .cxo-item img {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }
        .cxo-item p {
            margin: 0;
        }
    .cxo-item{ 
        .h2 {
            font-size: 20px;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin: 10px 0 20px;
        } }
    /* JET REPORTS */
    .row2 {
    top: -120px;
    position: relative;
}
    .d-flex {
    display: flex !important;
}
    .shadow {
    box-shadow: 0 8px 16px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .08) !important;
}
    .justify-content-center {
    justify-content: center !important;
    }
       

    /*SAP Page */
    .sapheader {
            font-size: 1.1em;
            color: #00aaff;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .saptitle {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .sapbuttons {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }
        .sapbutton {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 15px 30px;
            font-size: 1em;
            text-align: center;
            color: #fff;
            background-color: #00aaff;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-decoration: none;
        }
        .sapbutton.secondary {
            background-color: #fff;
            color: #00aaff;
            border: 2px solid #00aaff;
        }
        .sapbutton:hover {
            background-color: #0077cc;
        }
        .sapbutton.secondary:hover {
            background-color: #e6f7ff;
        }
    /* SAP Page */
    /* Microsoft page */
    container {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px;
            background-color: #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            border-radius: 10px;
        }
        .header {
            color: #0099ff;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 16px;
        }
        .main-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #333;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        .button {
            margin: 10px;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            font-size: 1em;
            color: #fff;
            background-color: #0099ff;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            text-decoration: none;
            display: inline-block;
        }
        .button.secondary {
            background-color: #5bc0de;
        }
    .testimonial {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: #f5faff;
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }
        .testimonial img {
            border-radius: 50%;
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            object-fit: cover;
            margin-right: 20px;
        }
        .testimonial .content {
            max-width: 600px;
        }
        .testimonial .content p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        .testimonial .content h4 {
            font-size: 1.1em;
            color: #000;
            margin: 0;
        }
        .testimonial .content h5 {
            font-size: 1em;
            color: #666;
            margin: 0;
        }
        .testimonial .content a {
            color: #00aaff;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 1em;
        }
    
 /* Styling for Tab Section */
    .webinar{
        color: #00a8e8!important;
            font-size: 14px !important;
        top: 10px !important;
        position: relative;
    }
    .paragraphhome{
        font-size:18px !important;
        font-weight: 500 !important;
    }
   
    /* Styling for the sticky header */
    .lwc-4g1q55crn48.header  {
      border-radius: 16px;
      box-shadow: 0px 144px 40px 0px rgba(0, 58, 97, 0.00), 0px 92px 37px 0px rgba(0, 58, 97, 0.00), 0px 52px 31px 0px rgba(0, 58, 97, 0.01), 0px 23px 23px 0px rgba(0, 58, 97, 0.02), 0px 6px 13px 0px rgba(0, 58, 97, 0.02);
      backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
      transition: all 0.5s ease; /* Smooth transition for all properties */
      top: 20px;
      animation: slideDown 0.35s ease-out;
        width: 95%;
    left: 40px !important;
    background-color: #fff !important;
    }

     .lwc-4g1q55crn48.header {
      padding: 10px 40px;
      margin-top: 15px;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
    }
    @keyframes slideDown {
      from {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
      }
      to {
        transform: translateY(0);
      }
    }
  

    .mb-lg-0 {
    width: unset !important;
}
    .financialheading{
        font-size: 18px;
    }
    .resourcestext{
        text-align: center !important;
    }
       
.order-md-1 h6{
      color: #31AB46;
      font-size: bold;  
}
    
.finance-text{
    margin: auto auto
    padding: auto auto
    color: #1e2556;
    font-weight: 400;
}
    .finance{
        text-align: center !important:
    }
    
    
/* Hompage Heading */
.mb-4{
font-size: 48px;
}
    .headinggreen{
        color: #31AB46;
        font-size: bold;
    }
    .homepageparagraph{
        font-size: 16px;
    }
    /* Hompage 2nd Section */
    .homepagesection2 {
    text-align: center;
}
    
    /* Hompage Finance Section */
    .finance {
    background: linear-gradient(162deg,#fff -6.86%,#F7FFF9 32.81%);
    background-image: url(/wp-content/themes/insightsoftware/images/2024-redesign/bg-pattern-green.png),linear-gradient(162deg,#fff -6.86%,#F7FFF9 32.81%);
    background-size: 170px
}

.finance .text-primary,.finance .btn-link {
    color: #31ab46!important
}

.finance .btn-primary {
    background-color: #31ab46;
    border-color: #31ab46
}

.finance .btn-primary:hover {
    background-color: #007615;
    border-color: #007615
}

.finance .btn-outline-primary {
    color: #31ab46;
    border-color: #31ab46
}

.finance .btn-outline-primary:hover {
    border-color: #007615;
    color: #007615
}

.finance .bg-cloud-blue,.finance .inProgress {
    background-color: #f5fbf6!important
}

.finance .bg-primary {
    background-color: #31ab46!important;
}

.finance ul.dots li {
    text-align: center
}

.finance ul.dots li button:before {
    color: rgba(49,171,70,.25)
}

.finance ul.dots li.slick-active button::before {
    color: #31ab46!important
}

#block_bu_scrolling .bu-content {
    flex: 1 1 40%;
}

.text-decoration-none{
    text-decoration: none !important;
}

.finance .bg-primary{
    background-color: #31ab46 !important;
}

.d-inline-block{
    display: inline-block !important;
}
.one-solution {
    font-size: 12px;
}
.fw-semibold {
    font-weight: 500!important;
}

.gap-5{
    gap: 3rem !important
}
 @media (min-width:992px){
    .d-lg-flex{
        display: flex !important;
    }
 }
    .py-1{
    padding-top: .25rem !important;
    padding-bottom: .25rem !important;
 }

 .px-3{
    padding-right: 2rem !important;
    padding-left: 2rem !important;
 }
    .py-5{
        padding-top: 3rem !important;
        padding-bottom: 3rem !important;
    }
    .one-solution {
    color: #fff !important;
}
    .rounded-3{
        border-radius: 20px;
    }
    .mb-5{
        margin-bottom: 3rem !important;
    }
    
    .bu-image {
    flex: 1 1 40%;
}
    @media(min-width: 1400px) {
    .container-xxl,.container-xl,.container-lg,.container-md,.container-sm,.container {
        max-width:1320px;
    }
}
    .bg-primary{
        background-color: #00a8e8!important;
    }
 
    /* Hompage Section 3 */
    .bg-white {
    --bs-bg-opacity: 1;
    background-color: #fff !important;
}
    .home .animated {
    display: inline-block;
    text-indent: 8px;
    min-width: 248px;
    position: relative;
    text-align: center;
    height: 38px;
}
    .p-4{
        padding: 1.4rem !important;
    }
    .text-center{
        text-align:center;
        font-size: 40px;
    }
    @media(min-width: 1200px) {
    h5,.h5 {
        font-size:1.5rem;
    }
}

.row {
    --bs-gutter-x: 1.5rem;
    --bs-gutter-y: 0;
    display: flex !important;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-top: calc(-1*var(--bs-gutter-y));
    margin-right: calc(-0.5*var(--bs-gutter-x));
    margin-left: calc(-0.5*var(--bs-gutter-x));
}

.row>* {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    padding-right: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x)*.5);
    padding-left: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x)*.5);
    margin-top: var(--bs-gutter-y)
}

.col {
    flex: 1 0 0%
}
    .col-lg-4 {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
        width: 33.33333333%;
    }
    
    /*Image page button style*/
    .mb-cat-1{
        
        background-color: #00A8E8;
        color: white;
        border-radius: 5px;
    }
    .mb-cat-1:hover{
        background:color:#26b5eb;
    }
    
   
    
</style>
